text:
You should start off by working backwards and determine what causes this trigger. If it is a certain property or through a form submission. 

If it is through a property, then you just need to make sure that is updated when this new item comes in. 

If it is via form submission Iâ€™d like to add a property update to how it starts. 

Those are two directions you can go that would provide the least resistance and have minimal time and effort needed
Support will be best to take care of this
